attributes.action: Petition for having HD on Freeview free of charge or delete the Licence Fee instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Want free subscription for high definition(HD): 1920x1080p resolution, with 24fps,& 60fps on Freeview when the analogue TV aerial (antenna, air-to-air) signal is terminated.

1080i - no good, for extremely; Slow,& fast moving objects - possible health risk problems...

1920x1080p 24fps - best storage/transfer ...

Web site below verifies TV picture quality is well past 1080p resolution,which is why 1080p instead of 1080i should be the UK HD freeview standard(2048x1556) or (4096x3112)):

http://www.avguide.com/the-perfect-vision/76/bluray.php

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
